title: Science Lecture Design Through ICT-Enabled Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills and secondary-level science knowledge
context.additional_context: Learners aim for a beginner-level understanding of diverse science fields, using real-time collaboration tools and asynchronous learning platforms in parallel in BYOD environments. The course focuses on effectively integrating ICT into science content delivery.

learning_goals: Learners can utilize at least three types of digital content (quizzes, virtual labs, etc.) to explain science concepts in blended learning environments
Learners can propose science problem-solving solutions at least twice through collaboration with peers on online discussion platforms
Learners can express opinions on science topics with over 90% participation rates using interactive features (polling, breakout rooms) in real-time video conferencing tools (Zoom, etc.)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
